short_summary: Modernize the training system and operational readiness modernization system (STORM) of the Royal Canadian Navy
description: The Royal Canadian Navy requires a training system that can support sailors throughout their career, ensure they maintain the appropriate readiness level, and reach them wherever they are located. The new system must integrate and optimize NTS assets and learners' profiles, exchanging data across RCN systems. The project aims to transform the current NTS to meet the training demands driven by a modern and digital future fleet.

**Title: System of Training and Operational Readiness Modernization (STORM)**

**Reference Number:** WS4215386401-Doc4218517628

**Publication Date:** September 21, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 10, 2023, 2:00 pm EST
**Notes:**

We are seeking bids to modernize the Canadian Navy (RCN) system for training and operational readiness. The successful supplier will provide a system that aims to transform the way training is conducted, enabling readiness for RCN sailors throughout their careers, regardless of location.

**Objective:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to modernize the current National Training System (NTS) to meet the training demands driven by a modern and digital future fleet. This project is known as System of Training and Operational Readiness Modernization (STORM).

**UNSPSC Codes:**
60100000 - Developmental and professional teaching aids and materials and accessories and supplies
60101100 - Electronic learning aids
86130000 - Specialized educational services
86131800 - Military education
86141700 - Educational technology

**Notice Type:** Request for Information

**Procurement Method:**

The PSPC will employ a competitive, open-bidding process. Suppliers interested in submitting bids must register and download the necessary documents from the Ariba Discovery website.

**Attachments:**

No attachment is available for this announcement.

**Language (Language)**
English français

**Contact Information:**

Harold McKenny (SPAC/PSPC) can be contacted at harold.mckenny@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Home Office and Agency:**

Canada
